Submodules¶

processor.processor_MHAD module¶

class processor.processor_MHAD.Processor(argv)¶

Bases: processor.utils.argument_parser.ArgumentParser

Inspired by https://github.com/yysijie/st-gcn Processor that handles

  • Training of the model

  • Testing / evaluation of the model

  • Initializations of the whole training procedure

  • Logging

  • Load & save results / models

calculate_acc_bin(binary_prediction)¶

Calculate top-k accuracy :param k: k :return: accuracy

calculate_meta_precision_and_recall(meta_prediction_frag, meta_labels_frag)¶
calculate_precision(binary_predictions, binary_labels)¶

Calculate Precision (true_positive / (true_pos + false_pos) :return: precision

calculate_recall(binary_predictions, binary_labels)¶

Calculate recall (true_positive / (true_pos + False_neg)

Returns

Recall ratio

calculate_topk(k)¶

Calculate top-k accuracy :param k: k :return: accuracy

count_parameters(model)¶
create_meta_binary_labels(label_multiclass, num_class)¶
device()¶

Set used device: CPU / single GPU :return: used devuce

Freeze the specified layers of the model

static get_parser(add_help=True)¶

Extended argument parser with general options for the processor :param add_help: boolean flag to enable command line help :return: parser

Load data and use specified data feeder and data sampler :return:

load_loss(weight)¶

Load specified loss :return: loss

load_model(dummy_input)¶

Load & initialize model specified in configuration :return: initialized model

load_optimizer(model)¶

Load specified optimizer :return: optimizer

load_scheduler()¶

Load specified scheduler :return: scheduler

load_weights()¶

Load specified weights into model

show_epoch_info()¶

Show informations per epoch

show_eval_info()¶

Show extended informations after an evaluation / testing phase

show_iter_info(progress_bar)¶

Show informations per iteration :param progress_bar: tqdm progress bar

start()¶

Start training of an model This function unifies the whole procedure on a very high level with

  • model training

  • model evaluation

  • saving weights

  • parametrization of optimizer / scheduler

  • logging

test()¶

Test model and print out / store statistics

train()¶

Train model an epoch This function is the real training of the model with

  • forward pass

  • backward pass

  • optimization of weights

  • logging of single iterations

update_progress_bar(progress_bar)¶

Update progress bar during training / testing :param progress_bar: tqdm progress bar

processor.processor_MHAD.one_hot_embedding(labels, num_classes)¶

Embedding labels to one-hot form.

Args:

labels: (LongTensor) class labels, sized [N,]. num_classes: (int) number of classes.

Returns:

(tensor) encoded labels, sized [N, #classes].
